subject: MHA
name: Hlth Finance Appl
info: Advanced applications and topics in health care finance, including extensive financial ratio analysis.

subject: MHA
name: ISNs
info: Growth and development of integrated healthcare systems based on open-system perspective of health organizations.  Process of development and strategies of a variety of organizational arrangements.  Implications for roles of managers, trustees, and physicians.

subject: MHA
name: Med. Device Industry
fullname: Medical Device Industry: Business and Public Policy
info: Business, public policy, regulatory, technology management issues concerning medical device/biotechnology industries. Nature/effects of private-public sector interactions. Involvement by leaders in Minnesota organizations.

subject: MHA
name: Soc of Medicine
info: Social and psychological components of health and medical care.  Organization and delivery of healthcare services, their problems and perspectives, focus on the patient, provider of care, and environment in which healthcare services are dispensed.

subject: MHA
name: Healthy Populations
info: Modeling community based approaches to population health: effects of demographic and health service variables on the health status of populations in the community; methods and measures for community health assets and needs assessment; field applications for health care managers.

subject: MHA
name: Alt Patterns in HC
info: Social and psychological components of health and medical care. Organization and delivery of healthcare services, their problems and perspectives; focus on the patient, provider of care, and environment in which healthcare services are dispensed.

subject: MHA
name: Extl Forces in HC
fullname: External Forces Affecting Health Services Delivery
info: Guidance in development of concepts, models, and principles of financing, social policy making, and organizing and human resource development for health services delivery. Written paper and teaching presentation required.prereq: PhD student

subject: MHA
name: Research Appl to HC
fullname: Research Applications to Health Services Delivery
info: Tutorial guidance and supervised course development covering research design, application, analysis, and presentation in health services delivery.

subject: MHA
name: Non-Parametrics
fullname: Non-Parametric Statistical Methods in Healthcare Research
info: Development of student-selected non-parametric statistics and its application to healthcare delivery and research.

subject: MHA
name: Research Practicum
info: Field experience in healthcare research. Supervised independent and team research on selected topics and problems.prereq: PhD student

subject: MHA
name: Pol Aspects of HC
info: Interrelationships between government, politics, and healthcare; political and social basis of health legislation and community decision making in provision and modification of health services.
